details: These brake pads have terrible stopping power for my delivery van. Had to brake much earlier than usual to stop safely. Not suitable for commercial use.
These pads create excessive dust that coats my delivery truck wheels. Makes the fleet look unprofessional and requires frequent cleaning.
These brake pads perform adequately on my delivery van. Nothing special but they get the job done for regular routes.
Only lasted 10,000 miles on my delivery route. Previous brand lasted twice as long. Not cost-effective for commercial fleets.
These brake pads are decent for the price. Not the best performance but acceptable for our lighter delivery vans.
These brake pads perform excellently on our heavy delivery trucks. Consistent stopping power even with full cargo loads.
These pads make an annoying squealing noise when braking with a full delivery load. Customers have complained about the noise.
Bought these for our delivery fleet. Some sets performed well, others failed within weeks. Quality control seems poor.
These pads work adequately for our light delivery vans but wouldn't trust them on heavier vehicles.
These brake pads failed after just 8,000 miles on our delivery route. Had to replace them on all our vans. Dangerous and costly.
These brake pads have been reliable on our delivery trucks. Consistent performance in various weather conditions.
These pads are mediocre at best for commercial use. They work, but there are better options for delivery fleets.
These pads have terrible stopping power in wet conditions. Nearly caused an accident on my delivery route during rain.
The durability is average for our delivery vans. Not impressive but not terrible either.
The quality of these brake pads is disappointing for commercial use. Wouldn't recommend for any serious delivery fleet.
These pads perform well on our daily delivery routes. Reliable stopping power and reasonable durability.
The performance is subpar for our delivery trucks. Longer stopping distances than advertised.
These pads are acceptable for our medium-duty delivery vans. Not exceptional but they do the job.
Experienced dangerous brake fade when fully loaded with deliveries. Had to downshift to compensate. Extremely unsafe.
These pads offer decent everyday performance for our local delivery vans. Nothing special but reliable.
These brake pads excel on our heavy delivery routes. Great stopping power even with full cargo loads.
These pads are too noisy for our delivery fleet. Customers complain about the squealing when we arrive.
These brake pads are average for the price. They work fine on our lighter delivery vans.
These pads failed our fleet safety inspection after just 3 months. Had to replace all of them at significant cost.
The performance is adequate for our delivery vans. Not great, not terrible.
These brake pads have excellent durability on our delivery trucks. Still performing well after 30,000 miles.
Received pads of varying thickness in the same box. Caused uneven braking on our delivery vans. Dangerous.
These pads are decent for our local delivery routes. Wouldn't use them for longer highway routes though.
These pads become unreliable in cold weather. Our morning delivery routes were dangerous until they warmed up.
The performance is acceptable for our delivery fleet. Nothing to write home about but they work.
These brake pads cannot handle our fully loaded delivery trucks. Dangerous lack of stopping power when carrying packages.
These brake pads provide good stopping power for our delivery vans. Reliable performance even with heavy loads.
These pads have an average lifespan on our delivery vehicles. About what you'd expect for the price point.
These pads wear out extremely quickly on our city delivery routes with frequent stops. Not economical at all.
These brake pads are decent for the cost. They perform adequately on our smaller delivery vans.
These pads developed an uneven wear pattern on our delivery trucks. Caused vibration and uneven braking.
These pads are adequate for light-duty delivery vans. Wouldn't recommend for heavier commercial vehicles.
These brake pads completely failed under our heavy delivery schedule. Had to replace them after just 5,000 miles.
These pads offer reasonable performance for our delivery fleet. Not outstanding but reliable enough.
These pads have poor heat resistance on our delivery routes with hills. Experienced significant fade on descents.
These brake pads work great on our courier vans. Reliable stopping power for frequent stops on delivery routes.
The quality of these brake pads is mediocre at best. Just barely acceptable for our delivery fleet.
These pads have dangerous performance characteristics. Nearly caused an accident on our delivery route.
These pads are acceptable for daily use on our delivery vans. Nothing special but they work.
These pads provide inconsistent braking on our delivery trucks. Sometimes grab too hard, other times too soft.

These pads have a below average lifespan on our delivery fleet. Had to replace them sooner than expected.
